Class AbstractReportViewerAction

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.action.Action
      com.jasperassistant.designer.viewer.actions.AbstractReportViewerAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction, IReportViewerListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractExportAction, ExportMenuAction, FirstPageAction, LastPageAction, NativePrintAction, NextPageAction, PreviousPageAction, PrintAction, ReloadAction, ZoomActualSizeAction, ZoomFitPageAction, ZoomFitPageWidthAction, ZoomInAction, ZoomOutAction
public abstract class AbstractReportViewerAction
extends org.eclipse.jface.action.Action
implements IReportViewerListener

Base class for report viewer actions

Author:
Peter Severin (peter_p_s@users.sourceforge.net)

Constructor Detail

AbstractReportViewerAction

public AbstractReportViewerAction(IReportViewer viewer)
Constructs the action by specifying the report viewer to associate with the action.

Parameters:
viewer - the report viewer

AbstractReportViewerAction

public AbstractReportViewerAction(IReportViewer viewer,
                                  int style)
Constructs the action by specifying the report viewer to associate with the action. An additional style style parameter allows to customize the action style.

Parameters:
viewer - the report viewer
style - action style
See Also:
IAction
Method Detail

calculateEnabled

Calculates the enablement condition

Returns:
true if the action should be enabled

runBusy

protected void runBusy()
Subclasses can override this method to run the action with busy cursor.

dispose

public void dispose()
An explicit dispose method that must be called in case when the action is removed from its container dynamically (as opposed to the static toolbar/menu constructed only once). Calling this method will detach the action from the associated report viewer.
